channel.title: Testing on YING ZHEN LI
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on YING ZHEN LI

item.title: Table Driven Tests
item.description: package main import "testing" func TestCoverage(t *testing.T) { type args struct { condition bool } tests := []struct { name string args args wantErr bool }{ // TODO: Add test cases. } for _, tt := range tests { t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) { if err := Coverage(tt.args.condition); (err != nil) != tt.wantErr { t.Errorf("Coverage() error = %v, wantErr %v", err, tt.wantErr) } }) } }
